predicate.note: Frames file for 'redress' based on sentences in wsj. No access to Verbnet at the moment.

roleset.name: right a wrong

example.name: two wrongs make a right?
example.text: It now has the chance [*] to redress that record in Namibia.

roleset.note: Technically, 'redress' could also have a sense of 'get dressed again,' but I doubt that would ever actually occur.
